DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith® p-Branch® Zenith® Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft Single-Center Study clinical trial approve US FDA study safety effectiveness Zenith® p-Branch® Zenith® Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft treatment abdominal aortic aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Zenith® p-Branch® Zenith® Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Abdominal aortic aneurysm > 5.0 cm 2 time normal aortic diameter Abdominal aortic aneurysm history growth > 0.5 cm 6 month Penetrating juxtarenal aortic ulcer > 10 mm depth 20 mm diameter Age < 18 year Life expectancy < 2 year Pregnant breast feed Inability refusal give inform consent Unwilling unable comply followup schedule Additional medical restriction specify Clinical Investigation Plan Additional anatomical restriction specify Clinical Investigation Plan
